content:
A doctor collected data on how many hours children of different ages slept in a day. Data for $5$ participants are shown below.
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Age (years)** | $1$ | $2$ | $3$ | $5$ | $8$
**Sleep (hours)** | $13$ | $11$ | $10$ | $9$ | $8$
